val:
Hello! Interestingly, I have been a student of Bio-Maths in my high school and got introduced to programming in my freshman year at BIT Mesra. Since then, I started developing Web and ML projects, and completed my Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering (2016-2020) with 86.3% aggregate.

Today, I'm currently working as a scrum developer responsible for several microservices code development and testing in Amdocs Technology Billing and RTB project.

I have also been awarded as Winner in Design Thinking Hackathon and Runners-Up in Project ICE Fair by Amdocs.

Here is a list of the technologies that I work with in Amdocs!
